casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Mapp, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Mapp v. Indus. Comm. (1999), 85 Ohio St.3d 342.]

(No. 98-1326 Submitted February 23, 1999 Decided April 21, 1999.) Philip J. Fulton & Associates and William A. Thorman III, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William J., McDonald, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Douglas, J., dissents.
